text: We are sorry about the #powercut in #Evesham & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 19:30. Ellie
Engineers continue to work on the #powercut in #Hereford #HR2 and are now estimating to restore all supplies by 23:30. Our apologies for the delay and any inconvenience caused. David.
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Hereford #HR2 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 19:00. Ellie
All power supplies are restored at #StAustell #PL26 and the surrounding area. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused due to the #powercut
We are sorry about the #powercut in #StAustell #PL26 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 01:30. Ellie
All supplies to #Oakham #LE15 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut. Ellie
There is currently a #powercut in #Oakham #LE15 & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 15:00. Owen
Apologies for the ongoing #powercut affecting #Bridgwater #TA6 our engineers continue to work on the fault and are now estimating to have power restored by 15:00. Owen
Update #Powercut we've got most supplies back on in the #Bridgwater #TA6 area but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 12:00. Sorry for the delay. Andi.
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Bridwater #TA6 and surrounding areas.  Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 10:30.
All customers affected by the #powercut in #DE24 #Derby now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.   Siân
Update #Powercut we've got the majority of supplies back on in #Derby #DE24 but are working hard to restore the remaining properties by approximately 03:00. Apologies for the delay.  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #DE24 #Derby area. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 01:00.  Siân.
All supplies to #Coventry #CV1 #CV5 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut  Siân
Update on a #powercut in #Coventry #CV1 #CV5 and surrounding area, engineers are still working on this and aim to have all properties back on by 21:00.
We are aware of a #powercut in the #Coventry #CV5 and surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 14:30. Andi.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Wolverhampton #WV1 #WV6 #WV10 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #Wolverhampton #WV1 #WV6 #WV10 area. We aim to restore all supplies by 05:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Newcastle #ST4 #ST5 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.   Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Newcastle #ST4 & #ST5 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 22:30. Drew
